title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Foundational Programming and Cognitive Load Theory Application for Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can implement simple algorithms using basic programming constructs (conditional statements, loops, functions)
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in solving complex problems collaboratively with peers by leveraging collective working memory effects
Learners can independently perform the plan-execute-evaluate learning cycle three or more times by applying self-regulated learning strategies
Learners demonstrate near transfer ability to apply acquired knowledge to new situations through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
